title: Automation Workflow Failed
description: Fired when an automation workflow fails during execution.

executionId.description: Unique identifier for this specific workflow execution.

errorMessage.description: A human-readable message describing the workflow failure.

failedStep.description: The identifier or name of the step where the workflow failed.

stepsCompleted.description: The number of workflow steps completed before the failure.

totalSteps.description: The total number of steps in the workflow.

isRetryable.description: Whether the failed workflow execution can be retried.
